location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 16 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding extracts from letters received from the Government Agent at Shiraz; copies of these extracts have not been included in this volume.The letter has been crossed out with a large X from top to bottom.
